content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- Read trip type tsv file (Tab seperated value) USE type = csv BUT USE field terminator is \t
SELECT * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t'
    )AS trip_type;
